name: Bats Off!
description:
Team Marmalade:

Miranda Blackgoat - 2D & 3D Artist

Nadine Malan - Animator, 3D Artist, Programmer

Leah Wood Canter - Composer, Sound Designer

Alexander Zhu - Composer, Sound Designer

Hikari Oishi - Programmer

Controls:

Keyboard -

  • W / S - vertical movement
  • A / D - horizontal movement
  • Space Bar - Speed Boost
  • E - Echolocation

Controller -

  • Left Stick - movement
  • A / Gamepad Down - Speed Boost
  • R Trigger - Echolocation
